  US ( UK lift) a small room in a tall building which carries people or goods up and down to different levels of the building: I took the elevator to her office on the fourteenth floor.
a moving strip which can be used for taking goods off a ship, putting bags onto an aircraft, etc.: They place the bales onto an elevator that transports them to a shredding mill.
